# demopkg

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of demopkg is to demonstrate how to make an R package. 

## Installation

You can install demopkg from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github("BartlettJE/demopkg")
```
